data.text:
Our clients have provided alarming feedback detailing a multitude of issues they encountered during their stay, which have left them deeply dissatisfied and concerned for their well-being. The following are some of the major concerns raised:

Poor Hygiene and Mold in Rooms: Our clients reported the presence of mold in their rooms, which is highly unacceptable and poses a serious health risk to guests.

Presence of Insects: Perhaps the most concerning issue raised was the presence of insects throughout the property, including on the breakfast trays. This is not only unhygienic but also poses a significant health hazard.
data.title: Terrible - Insects in breakfast

data.text: I stayed in this hotel 3 nights with a group of 13 people of my students to participate in dental exhibition. Comparing to the prices every thing was satisfiable. The gesture of staff was good. The location of hotel was great , it was close to metro, the rooms and pool were clean. The only issue of hotel was the noise of club at nights which was disaster. The quality of beakfast was so so. Overally in economical situation this hotel is a good choice and I recommend it.
data.title: Economic and good

data.text: Thieves, a mafia running hotel, the worst hotel in the world, never advise anyone to stay in this hotel. We stayed three nights there and experienced so many bad things, they stole our money when we werent in and when we told them they just laughed and did nothing
data.title: Theft, rubbery

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text: We're sorry for any inconvenience caused during your stay. We hope that our staff can make up for it on your next visit.
owner_response.author: Golden Tulip Deira

data.text:
This is the worst behaviour of staff I've ever experienced #367112391 my booking number 
My wife and me book one room for my brother from Abu Dhabi. I asked my wife to check-in, meanwhile we will park our car then follow you there in hotel. we reach there with our belongings then the staff named #TARUN receptionist (indian) #MARIA manager (Arabic speaker) without even asking anything directly  said not allowed you booked only for 2person, (I know you people you book for 2people then bring 21 people with you) this is the exact same word the manager Maria said. Then the receptionist asked us how long you stay there then we said only 2hours we will stay then we both will leave them, then he collected our E.ID
we provide our ID'S. But after that that manager already called a bouncer to remove us from there then the receptionist understand that his manager don't allowed us to stay there. Immediately he reacted towards us and said -  you are not allowed behind you there is the exit door you can leave (exact word of him). 

On the spot we left that hotel. And we booked same day hotel on orchid for 2days. This is the worst experience we had ever faced.

#GOLDEN TULIP HOTEL #DEIRA DUBAI #IS THE WORST STAFF I'VE EVER WITNESSED IN MY LIFE.
data.title: #GOLDEN TULIP HOTEL #DEIRA DUBAI #IS THE WORST STAFF I'VE EVER WITNESSED IN MY LIFE.

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guest,

Greetings from Golden Tulip Deira Hotel!

Thank you for letting us know about this. We apologize that our service did not satisfy your expectations. Your feedback helps us do better. We are looking into this issue and hope to resolve it promptly and accurately.
Looking forward to seeing you again in future. 

Sincerely,

Golden Tulip Deira Front Office Team
owner_response.author: Golden Tulip Deira reservations

data.text: The worst hotel ever ! I regretted I booked this hotel.rude unprofessional staffs  especially front desk staffs .especially Moroccan lady Maria and Indian guy tarun .seemed like they never needed guest out of anger .this is the  closest to having a hotel scam shame on them. We booked for two days but we didnot stay there because of rude staffs and they didnot refund as well .worst hotel Everseen strictly not recommended for families and couples we will never ever come back again.I do there is no option to comment without star zero star .
data.title: Unprofessional staff Maria

owner_response.title: Owner response
owner_response.text:
Dear Guests,

Greetings from Golden Tulip Deira hotel!

Thank you for taking the time to write to us. Apologized for the delay and for the inconvenience you've experience. We always strive to give the best service to our guests and we are sorry that we did not meet your expectations. We will make sure we share the feedback with our staff to ensure  it does not happen again.

We hope to see you again soon to change your expectations.

Sincerely,
Golden Tulip Deira Hotel Front Office Team
owner_response.author: Golden Tulip Deira reservations
